name: Office Dating Simulator 2020
description:
Install instructions

Ever wanted to date a giant rat? Bake a cheesecake with a potted plant? Commit credit card fraud? Burn your corporate hellhole workplace to the ground? It's time to discover a budding office romance in Office Dating Simulator 2020!

Office Dating Simulator 2020 offers:

  • 6 romance-able coworkers
  • A look into the thrilling day-to-day life of a corporate mail person
  • Jeremy

Move with the [arrow keys]. Tap [Z] to chat with your fellow coworkers, to pick up and place items, and to interact with objects. Remember to pass out the mail, then complete favors for coworkers to build relationships with those handsome devils!

Made for the Ludum Dare 47 with the theme "stuck in a loop."

Code & writing by Joshua Edwards (@glenk_) and Tamiks (@tamiks_properer), art & animation by Cosmo Wegman (@crelishboy) and [F] (@loveboxf), and music by Aaron Weatherford (@atw_music1232).
